name: Estranged: Act II
detailed_description:
Before Downloading

Please ensure your computer meets the minimum requirements listed below before downloading Estranged.

Due to the game being more graphically intensive, computers that ran Act I may not be able to run Act II.


About the Game

Estranged: Act II follows the story of a fisherman, stranded on a mysterious island during a violent storm.

The game continues after the events of Estranged: Act I, which followed our hero's adventure in a search for a way to get home.

Experience what the island has in store as you uncover the secretive Arque Corporation, burrowing ever deeper into their dangerous and haphazard operations.

Key Features

  • Adventure game with puzzle elements
  • Immersive story driven environments
  • Unique characters and narrative
  • Familiar first person shooter combat

Estranged Act II is built using Unreal Engine 4, please check the system requirements before downloading.

short_description: Estranged: Act II follows the story of a fisherman, stranded on a mysterious island during a violent storm. Little does he know his adventure has just begun, and the island is home to more than it first seems.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Bulgarian, French, Dutch, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Danish, Portuguese-Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit and above, fully updated
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470 or Radeon 6870 HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible card
  • Additional Notes: Requires newer hardware than Act I.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan or above
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Nvidia or AMD Graphics
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must support Metal: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT205073

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Tested on Ubuntu 16
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 470
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires newer hardware than Act I.

movies.name: Estranged: Act II Early Access Teaser
